name: Three Shots
description:
This game is my first ever 3D game. It was made with SFML and OpenGL. It is also my first ever online multiplayer game.

How to play with the keyboard:
  • Move with W, A, S, D or with arrow keys
  • Shoot with the left mouse button
How to play with a controller:
  • By default, move with the X & Y axis and rotate with the Z & R axis
  • Shoot with R2 
  • Keep in mind that you can change these settings and the shoot button is displayed as a number rather than as an image. 
How to run the game:

Once downloaded, unzip the folder and run Three Shots.exe

Servers:

Since this game has online multiplayer, of course, there are servers running this whole thing... The servers (at least for now) won't be online 24/7 but I might change that in the future.

Linux:

Since this is my first game that is also available on Linux and since it is not that simple to get it working, I have made a tutorial for running the game on Linux. (the game has been tested in Ubuntu 16.04 only)

Other:

In-game music: Aeonian by Zyzyx.

Font: Akashi by Ten by Twenty.
